previewArticle.title: Montreal Impact vs. Seattle Sounders | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Seattle Sounders 2, Montreal Impact 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Seattle Sounders fly across the continent to pay a visit to the Montreal Impact at Olympic Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Montreal Impact vs. Seattle Sounders
2ND LOOK: Djimi Traore makes clean contact on a bicycle kick

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Matt Doyle preview Montreal Impact's home opener against the Seattle Sounders. Will Andrew Wenger continue his early season success? How does Montreal's strategy change with Dempsey misssing the match? Find out Sunday at 4pm ET on MLS Live in the US and RDS in Canada.
timelineItems.title: Montreal Impact vs. Seattle Sounders Preview | The Scouting Report

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: Indicative of nothing, but the turf at Olympic Stadium looks a little better than it has in the past.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Eric Miller with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Free kick finish. @LamarNeagle pops one in off the post. @SoundersFC up 1-0 in the 8th minute over @impactmontreal. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Another goal conceded on a dead ball... #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders FC).
Eric Miller (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Bluecollardan
timelineItems.text: Stada is filled with the smell of fireworks and warm beer along with a late arriving crowd it makes for a flat atmosphere #imfc #imfclive

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 12’ - Verdict: was that an own goal or can we give it to Lamar?

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: MLS gives it as an OG. Witness my tremendous powers.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Chad Marshall.

timelineItems.name: Derek Young
timelineItems.text: Less talk about the own goal, more talk about Pineda’s delivery that led to it. #Sounders

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Kenny Cooper.
Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Kenny Cooper (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Joshua Mayers
timelineItems.text: Neagle's goal or own goal, the Sounders are on a 39-0-11 run when scoring first, the longest such unbeaten streak in MLS.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact).
Gonzalo Pineda (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: SAVE! Troy Perkins (Montreal Impact) has a brilliant one-handed save on a Seattle Sounders header.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Troy Perkins totally redeems himself with a fantastic one-handed save

timelineItems.name: LFTR
timelineItems.text: Les esprits s'échauffent facilement dans ce match. Serais surpris que ça se termine à 11v11. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: Would have rather seen two yellow cards than none there.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Lamar Neagle with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Troy Perkins wins Save of the Week. Done. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Andy Rose (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Gooners
timelineItems.text: #Sounders please give me a good end to this weekend

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Comme prévu côté montréalais, Mapp retrouve son flanc droit, Warner passe à gauche #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Gary Whittaker
timelineItems.text: #IMFC are playing this game like they are going to set a record for most goals scored against at home

timelineItems.name: Dr.Carlos Sports M.D
timelineItems.text: The Boy Wonder redeems himself. Amazing save. #IMFC #imfclive

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Montreal Impact 0, Seattle Sounders FC 2.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Défaite #IMFC qui montre les limites de l'équipe, surtout sans MDV. Gros match de Neagle et Alonso pour Seattle. #MLS #Compliqué

timelineItems.desc: The Seattle Sounders fly across the continent to pay a visit to the Montreal Impact at Olympic Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Montreal Impact vs Seattle Sounders | March 23, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @SoundersFC smash and grab three points on road from @impactmontreal. Highlights: http://t.co/bm3XjLcW01 http://t.co/WZs4BS6TaN #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Ride that bike, Djimi! #MTLvSEA http://t.co/l42EMU2bCX

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@SoundersFC ruin @impactmontreal's home opener. Recap: http://t.co/IFlslG4o0e #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Obafemi Martins was dangerous for @SoundersFC all last night, but this header put #MTLvSEA out of reach: http://t.co/vTDJaSm1Gh

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Jeff Salisbury
timelineItems.text: #IMFC not looking strong at all. Making Seattle look a decent side. Where are the goals going to come from??

timelineItems.name: DenisCoderre
timelineItems.text: Avec Marco Di Vaio #IMFC http://t.co/1l6IjNkXMl

timelineItems.name: DenisCoderre
timelineItems.text: Avec Marco Di Vaio #IMFC http://t.co/1l6IjNkXMl

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Ferrari est en forme #NoJinx #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Felipe Martins with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Chris Brinton
timelineItems.text: Gotta love Montreal's game play. Foul left and right then go down like a sack of potatoes when they get touched... #Sounders

timelineItems.comment: DeAndre Yedlin (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Collen Warner (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Rob Mensching
timelineItems.text: Quite a bit of slipping and sliding on that pitch considering it's indoors. Turf FTW. :( #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: 2e autobut dans l'histoire de #IMFC en MLS après celui de Ferrari contre #RSL (qui avait ensuite marqué dans le bon but en fin de match)

timelineItems.name: Llarian
timelineItems.text: So far Perkins is man of the match for both teams. #ebfg

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kenny Cooper (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by DeAndre Yedlin with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Montréal passe résolument par le côté droit. Remick ciblé ? #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Rob Mensching
timelineItems.text: Keller calling this is a more workman like game for the @soundersfc. I agree with that. Not pretty but hopefully functional. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Chad Marshall (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Amanda Stein
timelineItems.text: #IMFC - Attendance for the home opener: 27,207

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.

timelineItems.desc: SAVE! Stefan Frei (Seattle Sounders) saves at the near post.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Stefan Frei one-handed save at the near post preserves the lead

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Underway from Olympic Stadium between @impactmontreal + @SoundersFC. Follow here: http://t.co/zEVrPynIBd #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Et à Seattle, Martins semble seul en pointe avec, derrière lui, le trio Cooper, Rose, Neagle (de droit à gauche) #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Again Mapp showing amazing pace and skills on the right side of the field. #IMFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.desc: A curling shot by Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders) hits the left post.
timelineItems.title: POST: Lamar Neagle shakes the woodwork from distance

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Eric Miller (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the top left corner.

timelineItems.name: La Métropole Sports
timelineItems.text: #IMFC showing good attack just wish they had someone who could finish. #EtTuDiVaio

timelineItems.name: John Strong
timelineItems.text: Love the Scott's "used here" ad on the boards surrounding the artificial turf at Olympic Stadium #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders FC) hits the left post with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Obafemi Martins following a fast break.

timelineItems.name: Karel Houde-Hebert
timelineItems.text: Il faut profiter de nos chances!!! #imfclive #mls

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Seba_Enrique
timelineItems.text: Ferrari est juste plus l'ombre de lui même... C'est affreux #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Jeb Brovsky.

timelineItems.name: Bruce Englehardt
timelineItems.text: NEAGLE HITS THE POST! He really wants to score today! #Sounders 1-0 MTL #253

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: The "good news" defensively, Impact has not left the usual gap between its CMF & D back-line #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Klopas : "We have to stop giving goals out of nothing !" #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: The Bowler
timelineItems.text: Kenny Cooper is everywhere #EBFG

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: Clearly Wenger is NOT a striker. But can he have some help instead of leaving him alone #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Highlight: Lamar Neagle's flick on falls for @SoundersFC's opening goal. http://t.co/i3lXNDEFcK #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Gonzalo Pineda (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Waffo
timelineItems.text: Trois milieux défensifs et quand même des trous dans le milieu de Montréal. besoin de replacement. Bon match de Seatlle #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Ian
timelineItems.text: How on earth has camara not gotten a yellow card yet? #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Amanda Stein
timelineItems.text: #IMFC - We're 38 minutes into this one and the entire bench is warming up. Changes coming? Klopas has seen better starts from this group.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Photo exemple du placement haut de brovsky ET miller. L'effet Klopas? #IMFC #MTLvSEA http://t.co/iPLlaCj32p

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Photo exemple du placement haut de brovsky ET miller. L'effet Klopas? #IMFC #MTLvSEA http://t.co/iPLlaCj32p

timelineItems.name: Shannon Matthews
timelineItems.text: There is going to be a lot of ice baths after this one, this ref is doing nothing to protect the players. Poor officiating. #Sounders

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Collen Warner (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Aaron
timelineItems.text: Are the regular #mls refs back now? If so, can we get the replacements back? So many non-calls on obvious fouls both ways #sounders

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: The firm of Warner and Brovsky is where #imfc attacks go to die! #IMFClive #TSN690

timelineItems.desc: Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Hassoun Camara booked after several harsh fouls

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: I wouldn't sub out Wenger. I'd bring Santi González to give him a hand. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sophie J. Handfield
timelineItems.text: #soccer @impactmontreal @Montreal #IMFClive http://t.co/HpvKfSWsTO

timelineItems.name: Sophie J. Handfield
timelineItems.text: #soccer @impactmontreal @Montreal #IMFClive http://t.co/HpvKfSWsTO

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Impact avec des demi-chances, de bonnes intentions mais peu de danger dans la zone de vérité #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Dennis Azevedo
timelineItems.text: Was that a cross or a shot? #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: Camara finally gets a yellow. Believe that's his third foul on Martins and fourth overall.

timelineItems.name: Dennis Azevedo
timelineItems.text: Dumb move by Camara. He deserved a yellow card. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Montreal Impact 0, Seattle Sounders FC 1.

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: First time the Sounders have gone into halftime leading Impact, 1-0. Probably could have been 3-1 in their favor with some different breaks.

timelineItems.name: Jay Weisberger
timelineItems.text: Solid. Perkins the difference. #sounders calmly handling the press and countering well. Need to keep tight on D and be opportunistic. #ebfg

timelineItems.name: Brittaney
timelineItems.text: Would be super cool if we picked up the chances next half, ok? Please? #imfc #IMFCLIVE

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Miller et Ferrari très bons en 1re mi-temps. Beaucoup de revirements pour Wenger #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Harsh own-goal on Troy Perkins, but then you go and do something like this: http://t.co/4kDvvCFSre ...and totally redeem yourself. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: F.D. Laramée
timelineItems.text: Le duo Mapp-Miller est attrayant. S'il y avait un peu plus de menace sur l'autre flanc, ces gars-là pourraient faire des ravages. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Montreal Impact 0, Seattle Sounders FC 1.
Attempt saved. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Collen Warner.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Pas de changements pour l'Impact pour commencer la 2e demie #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: Ludovick Martin
timelineItems.text: Combien on gage que Klopas va faire rentrer Gonzalez, puis Smith, puis Mallace, changements télégraphiés. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: russ
timelineItems.text: Great atmosphere at the Big O for this game. I can barely understand the conversations 5 rows away. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Gonzalo Pineda.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Seattle's third kit looks good. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 4’ - Sounders going with a 4-2-3-1 that can morph into a 4-3-3 or 4-4-2…basically just playing soccer. #analysis

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: How many corners will it take for #IMFC to finally score a goal ?

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: Wenger est trop intellectuel. Il analyse les façons de tirer au lieu de tirer tout simplement #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gonzalo Pineda (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 51’ - Good start here by Montreal. Pressing for that equalizer. I’m pressing for some cookies but to no avail. Sac le bleu!

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - @impactmontreal and @SoundersFC have met twice in @MLS thus far, with Montreal winning both matches. Matchup. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Collen Warner (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 52’ - Montreal supporters section letting off smoke bombs. Inside. Ok then.

timelineItems.name: BOTNSoccer
timelineItems.text: The Impact putting some pressure on the Sounders trying to get back into it. #MTLvSEA #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hernán Bernardello (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Andrew Wenger.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Mapp est devenu le Felipe de 2012. On fait faute sur lui a repetition. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Tessa Mascia
timelineItems.text: Warner should be a fieldgoal kicker for the Als #IMFCLIVE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Dylan Remick.
Attempt missed. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Domenico Micheletti
timelineItems.text: Mes billets de saison @impactmontreal : 1ère rangée au Stade Saputo, 45e au Stade Olympique. J'hais le Big O. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: This game vs the Sounders will be Test #1 for Frank Klopas and his tact. adjustments #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Nick
timelineItems.text: Another corner = NOTHING ! #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) header from the center of the box is close, but misses the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Hassoun Camara's header fizzes just over the bar

timelineItems.name: Rob Mensching
timelineItems.text: The @SoundersFC are slowing this game way down. Hope that doesn't come back to bit 'em. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Felipe Martins.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 0, Seattle Sounders FC 2. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) header from very close range to the top left corner. Assisted by Kenny Cooper.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Obafemi Martins smashes in a Kenny Cooper cross to double the lead

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Eric Miller with a headed pass following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Josh Holloway
timelineItems.text: Gets a card and then almost gets a goal. Camara can’t do anything right. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Mapp est DE LOIN le joueur @impactmontreal capable de faire la différence offense. #IMFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Ludovick Martin
timelineItems.text: Défense apathique. Encore. #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: EmeraldCitySupporter
timelineItems.text: #ObaFlips

timelineItems.name: Thierry Abel
timelineItems.text: Change rien Frank... Tout va bien... #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Collen Warner (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Jason Robertson
timelineItems.text: 3 things we needed to see today: #Obagoal, multiple goals, and no unforgivable defensive mistakes. Check, check, and check. #ebfg #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - @SoundersFC won their first road opener in @MLS, but have not won in 4 tries since (2D 2L). Letdown. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Cue the back flip. Obafemi Martins doubles @SoundersFC lead over @impactmontreal. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Pierre Garon
timelineItems.text: Ouf....#IMFC a besoin de quelques joueurs de talent s'ils veulent esperer competitionner cette saison. Defensive tres poreuse!!!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jeb Brovsky (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Hernán Bernardello.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Hottell
timelineItems.text: Good work from Cooper to keep it alive and easy for Martins! #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Shawn Richardson
timelineItems.text: I wonder if we'll use the same lineup again next week? Do we have anybody else? #imfc

timelineItems.name: DiD
timelineItems.text: Je l'avais dit au camp et je le répète,la saison sera longue #IMFC

timelineItems.name: LFTR
timelineItems.text: Gonzalez et Pearce se préparent. Wenger et Camara out? #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Josh Holloway
timelineItems.text: 2-0 is a scary place to be. Let’s make it three. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Collen Warner.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Penalty!!! No Penalty!!!! I think it was. Je pense que oui #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Josh Holloway
timelineItems.text: Was that a good no-call or should there be a call point to the spot? #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Justin Mapp.

timelineItems.name: Douglas Gelevan
timelineItems.text: I have the feeling... If that is anyone other than Felipe, the ref points to the penalty spot #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: Paul Hanson
timelineItems.text: Unsure...but we may have gotten away with something there... #EBFG

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Andrew Wenger can't put enough mustard on a Mapp cross

timelineItems.name: Bobby Z
timelineItems.text: w/out #DiVaio in the lineup, one word perfectly sums up #IMFC's offensive attack... #anemic

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: Michael Azira making Sounders debut.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Justin Mapp with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 66’ - Sounders first sub of the match is Kenny Cooper for Mike Azira. Now a more natural 4-4-2…

timelineItems.name: Bruce Englehardt
timelineItems.text: Frei is catching everything right now. #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Alex Porras
timelineItems.text: les chances de marquer continuent de se multiplier pour #IMFC. Mais les ballons aboutissent tous entre les mains du gardien Frei #IMFClive

timelineItems.name: Eric Larson
timelineItems.text: Neagle down from friendly fire #SoundersFC

timelineItems.desc: GOAL! Seattle Sounders free kick is headed on by Lamar Neagle and bounces in off of Troy Perkins (Montreal Impact).
timelineItems.title: OWN GOAL: Lamar Neagle's header rattles the crossbar and bounces in off Perkins

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: Turf might look better but wow does it play fast.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact).
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Amanda Stein
timelineItems.text: #IMFC: 68' Blake Smith, who has a couple backflip moves of his own, subs in for Bernier. @HeathGPearce makes home debut, in for Brovsky.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Andy Rose (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Stade Saputo Officiel
timelineItems.text: 27 207 fans se sont présentés au Stade Olympique au premier match à domicile de l'@impactmontreal! On part la saison en force! ⚽️⚽️⚽️ #imfc #imfclive #bleublancnoir #mtlvssea

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot.
timelineItems.text: Pearce pour Brovsky le genre de changement qui aurait pu être fait la 0ème minute non ? #reposduguerrier #MTLvSEA #IMFC

timelineItems.name: LFTR
timelineItems.text: Klopas madly in love with Warner. ❤️❤️❤️❤️ #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Chad Marshall.

timelineItems.name: George Stefanopoulos
timelineItems.text: It will be a long year for the #IMFC ...#TFC will just steam roll this undermanned team..what a shame

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Felipe Martins with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: HabraCHadabra
timelineItems.text: So, as #IMFC will obviously miss the playoffs, who'll be the coach next year? #NDSejectableSeat

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 73’ - Leo comes in for Lamar. WELCOME BACK, LEO!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Leonardo González (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Andy Rose.

timelineItems.name: F.D. Laramée
timelineItems.text: 0-2 à 70 minutes, on fait un double changement, et le seul attaquant sur le banc reste sur le banc. Je ne comprends rien. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Osvaldo Alonso.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Bernadello panique. Il ne trouve plus Bernier sur le terrain #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Brandon Lemons
timelineItems.text: Umm did anyone see the Timbers logo just go past the screen? Whoever did that..... #SoundersFC

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Impact is more and more willing to take risks to score at least 1 goal. Sounders waiting to score on the counter #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Dave
timelineItems.text: Wow 25,000 fans expected in #Montreal for their game vs #SoundersFC of Seattle

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Why Bernadello out for Gonzalez in? #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Andrew Wenger (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Eric Duranleau
timelineItems.text: Belle vue de la section 121, rangée J, siège 10! #ScottsUtiliséIci #IMFC http://t.co/pctLDpe2Q9

timelineItems.name: Nigel Reed
timelineItems.text: Yes - I know it's #ElClasico but, if it's alright with you, I'll stick with @impactmontreal vs. @SoundersFC. #IMFC needs some points!

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Djimi Traore (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: BIKE: Djimi Traore smashes a bicycle kick right at Perkins

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Heath Pearce.

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: I have to admit I still have trouble understanding Klopas subs. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Camara - Martins, ça sent l'histoire d'amour #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: That is dead-ball delivery. Well done Gonzalo Pineda.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Djimi Traore (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andy Rose.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: On assume que Warner jouera comme milieu droit comme contre #Dynamo mais on verra #IMFC #SoundersFC #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: That was a remarkable attempt from Traore. Wow.

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: Has Olympic Stadium's roof ever worked properly?

timelineItems.desc: Eric Miller (Montreal Impact) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the right side of the box.
timelineItems.title: POST: Eric Miller smashes one off the woodwork

timelineItems.name: Noel Butler
timelineItems.text: Way too passive. When in possession hardly any movement off the ball. 0-2 down and the opponent is dictating the tempo #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Raphaël Larocque-Cyr
timelineItems.text: Let the game begin, finally.... #IMFC #SSFC http://t.co/CoKPHJYeUY

timelineItems.name: Sébastien Nolan
timelineItems.text: Pas de DiVaio, pas d'attaque! Et on peut pas dire que la défense a connu un gros match non plus. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Blake Smith (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Justin Plasket
timelineItems.text: You guys, all of the feels right now because of this game. All of the feels. So happy. #EBFG

timelineItems.name: Angeline Bounds
timelineItems.text: Yes! Dream Weaver! #EBFG RT @mattgaschk: .@CamWeaver23 about to make his first appearance for Seattle since 2006 in the USL.

timelineItems.comment: Eric Miller (Montreal Impact) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the right side of the box. Assisted by Andrew Wenger.

timelineItems.text: Highlight: Cooper to Martins. No doubt. 2-0 @SoundersFC. Watch --> http://t.co/qUIxYkAHji #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: I want one of those black Sounders jerseys.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by DeAndre Yedlin.

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 84’ - Miller then clangs one off the corner of the goal frame as he gets into the area. Everything going Seattle’s way today...

timelineItems.name: Whitney Jones
timelineItems.text: If you're going to cover your face to curse & not be seen on TV, you should probably stop before you uncover your face... #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Josh Holloway
timelineItems.text: A 4-3-3? Nice to see Neagle up top. Hopefully he’ll shine a bit more up there than on the wing. Also, hello #PitchBlack #MTLvSEA

Michael Azira (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Eric Belanger
timelineItems.text: Even though we are facing a 3rd loss to start the season, I like Justin Mapp and the Miller kid. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: The one and only @Djimi_Traore19 captains your @SoundersFC for what I’m saying is the first time to start a match. HI DJIMI! #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Mathieu Savoie
timelineItems.text: Qu'est que MTL a fait aux dieux du sport pour avoir tant de difficulté à la #mettrededans. #IMFC #Habs

timelineItems.name: Hugo Sham
timelineItems.text: Things are so bad so fast, when #IMFC hits a post, it's considered a moral victory @BWildeCTV @TheSoccerNoel

timelineItems.name: Ceciley
timelineItems.text: I LOVE THE PITCH BLACK JERSEYS SO BAD UGH #Sounders

timelineItems.name: Kris Mychasiw
timelineItems.text: Nothing beats seeing @pbernier10 lead the troops onto the field in their home game debut! #IMFC #imfclive

timelineItems.name: SHANE
timelineItems.text: Destiny! Fate! #ebfg

timelineItems.name: Greg Chiemingo
timelineItems.text: Lucky still counts 1-0 #SoundersFC with awkward goalie play on floating header

timelineItems.name: Nathan Santo Domingo
timelineItems.text: What a lame goal but I'll take it! #Sounders

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: C'est quand que Magee arrive pour sauver la job à Klopas? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jason Robertson
timelineItems.text: It's been a solid performance even without Dempsey and Evans. Also on the road. #ebfg #MTLvSEA #takethesepointsanyday

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Santiago González (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Heath Pearce with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Petros Mascia
timelineItems.text: This will be Seattle Sounders first win vs Montreal Impact #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: And now you know why Di Vaio should have won MVP last season. Clearly, the Impact are pretty hopeless offensively without him. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: vittorio silla
timelineItems.text: God this is gonna be a long season. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: IMFC Fans
timelineItems.text: Motif de satisfaction pour ce soir : dernier match de suspension pour Marco Di Vaio. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Seattle Sounders FC. Dylan Remick tries a through ball, but Cam Weaver is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Gooners
timelineItems.text: Solid win #Sounders with some key players out.

timelineItems.name: Frank MacDonald
timelineItems.text: First road opener win since 2009, first 2-goal road win since Chivas last season. Bon voyage #MTLvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: Frank Klopas keeps his winless record against Sounder, who win 2-0.
